Seasonal Favourites

Cherry Cha Cha

Cherry Cha Cha tastes uncannily like a chocolate covered cherry, and goes down nice and smooth.

Creamy Chocolate Raspberry

The Creamy Chocolate Raspberry tastes just like it sounds, with a red sugar rim to make it festive.

The Soft Love

The Soft Love is a reddish-pink cordial that tastes like banana and cherry.
